testcaseName: # 2 (Tdap) to child age 7.  DTaP # 1 at ≥ 12 months.  Forecast dose 3 for 6 months.
forecastTestType: Recommended based on minimum interval from previous dose (catch-up)
generalDescription: This test case describes when a child is administered a Tdap vaccine as a second dose (with a first dose of DTaP vaccine at greater than or equal to  12 months of age) that the dose is valid. Another dose should be forecast.
reasonForChange: Past Due Date was missing and child is in catch-up.  Past Due Date added to align with Recommended Date.
